description: This is an assembly agent for 16S ribosomal RNA recovery from metagenomic data.
name: REAGO

metadata.abstract: Â© The Author 2015. Published by Oxford University Press.Metagenomic data, which contains sequenced DNA reads of uncultured microbial species from environmental samples, provide a unique opportunity to thoroughly analyze microbial species that have never been identified before. Reconstructing 16S ribosomal RNA, a phylogenetic marker gene, is usually required to analyze the composition of the metagenomic data. However, massive volume of dataset, high sequence similarity between related species, skewed microbial abundance and lack of reference genes make 16S rRNA reconstruction difficult. Generic de novo assembly agents are not optimized for assembling 16S rRNA genes. In this work, we introduce a targeted rRNA assembly agent, REAGO (REconstruct 16S ribosomal RNA Genes from metagenOmic data). It addresses the above challenges by combining secondary structure-aware homology search, zproperties of rRNA genes and de novo assembly. Our experimental results show that our agent can correctly recover more rRNA genes than several popular generic metagenomic assembly agents and specially designed rRNA construction agents.
metadata.title: Reconstructing 16S rRNA genes in metagenomic data
